snippet: The Boston Red Sox continued to restock their lineup on Tuesday, agreeing to a three-year, $37.5 million contract with outfielder Shane Victorino.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox sign outfielder Shane Victorino to a three-year, $37.5 million contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox continued to restock their lineup on Tuesday, agreeing to a three-year, $37.5 million contract with outfielder Shane Victorino.

headline.main: Red Sox Add Another Bat In Victorino
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Add Another Bat In Victorino
